fortuneTeller:GlassesRelic.NAME: Glasses
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, reduce a random card's cost by #b1.

fortuneTeller:ConnectionRelic.NAME: Connection
DESCRIPTIONS: You can join the Tarot Assembly at the rest room.

fortuneTeller:FortuneRelic.NAME: Fortune
DESCRIPTIONS: You can see the top card of draw pile util you use this to draw a card each combat.

fortuneTeller:DeathknellRelic.NAME: Death Knell
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Shoot deals triple damage, gain one random debuff at the end of your turn.

fortuneTeller:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

fortuneTeller:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
fortuneTeller:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
